Class AdminFeaturesTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.aurora.AdminFeaturesTest
public class AdminFeaturesTest extends Object
COMPREHENSIVE ADMIN UNIT TESTS (EXTENDED) Total Tests: ~32 Covers User Stories: US 03.01.01 (Remove Events), US 03.02.01 (Remove Profiles) US 03.03.01 (Remove Images), US 03.04.01 (Browse Events) US 03.05.01 (Browse Profiles), US 03.06.01 (Browse Images) US 03.07.01 (Remove Organizers), US 03.08.01 (Review Logs)
